snippet: Harbinger Capital Partners lost 46.6 percent last year as Philip Falcone's biggest - and most controversial - investment took a beating, according to investors who spoke on condition of anonymity.
abstract: Harbinger Capital Partners lost 46.6 percent last year as Philip Falcone's biggest - and most controversial - investment took a beating, according to investors who spoke on condition of anonymity.

headline.main: LightSquared's Woes Weigh on Falcone Hedge Fund
headline.print_headline: Hedge Fund Is Said To Have Lost 46% of Its Value
